Uses of Package
templates

  • Packages that use templates 
    Package Description
    entity  
    main  
    templates  
  • Classes in templates used by entity 
    Class and Description
    GameObject
    An abstract class for an object which can be added to an instance of Game

    The act method can be implemented to provide a behavior for the object, and will be called every millisecond automatically by a Game it has been added to.
  • Classes in templates used by main 
    Class and Description
    Game
    An abstract Game class which can be built into Pong.

    The default controls are for "Player 1" to move left and right with the 'Z' and 'X' keys, and "Playr 2" to move left and right with the 'N' and 'M' keys.

    Before the Game begins, the setup method is executed.
  • Classes in templates used by templates 
    Class and Description
    GameObject
    An abstract class for an object which can be added to an instance of Game

    The act method can be implemented to provide a behavior for the object, and will be called every millisecond automatically by a Game it has been added to.
